pr_title: Enable checkstyle overload method ordering rule for Google Java Style

timeline.message: Enable checkstyle overload rule for Google Style

timeline.bodyText: I think that the previous ordering made slightly more sense: methods were ordered by their usage, top to bottom. How about renaming the checkMatch(Reference, TypeDescription) method to checkThirdPartyTypeMatch (or something similar) without reordering them?
timeline.author: mateuszrzeszutek
